entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 04:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
